subject: Re: Eugene PD
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi Derek,  

I so apologize for my delay here as I was offline last week for our company onsite. What time would work best for me to give you a ring today or tomorrow?

Best, 
Emily

On Thu, May 1, 2025 at 9:49?AM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	Are you around today for a phone call?

	
	Derek

	 

	Detective D. DeWitt

	Financial Crimes Unit

	Special Weapons and Tactics Team

	Background Investigations Team

	Eugene Police Department

	300 County Club Road

	Eugene, OR 97401

	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

	Work Cell � 541-743-6192



-- 



Emily Atzen
